description:
Assassin working for GPX. As a little girl she was sold by her mother to a master killer, who trained her since childhood.
She is captured by Keisuke after her second failed attempt on his life. She tries to kill him again several times (managing to burn his yacht Lizard). When Misty realizes she starts to develop feelings for Keisuke, she tries to commit suicide, but is saved by him.
Finally after Keisuke covers her with his own body during another attempt on his life, she accepts her feelings even up to fight and kill her own master to protect Keisuke.
name: Misty
